description: Aspose.CAD is a library for working with CAD file formats. The library allows to export CAD drawings into Pdfs or any other raster image format. The library has a large scalable and easy to use API, it is a cross platform solution and performs CAD processing using the same set of algorithms for different platforms. Unlike other solutions does not require AutoCAD to be installed and is a fully managed solution.
releaseNotes:
Aspose.CAD for .Net public release version 17.12.0 and we are pleased to announce it.
      The following is a list of changes in this version of Aspose.CAD.

      New Features:
      CADNET-457 Set compliance after converting CAD to PDF 
      CADNET-450 Support for rounded hidden lines when exporting DWG/DXF to BMP and PDF 
      CADNET-415 Support for reading XREF metadata for DWG file 
      CADNET-420 Wrong page size when exporting DWG to PDF (.NET) 
      CADNET-376 3D entities support for DGN v7 
      CADNET-371 Support for setting print area for DWG image in exported PDF 
      CADNET-355 DWG to PDF convert gives blank page 
      CADNET-343 Support for DWT file format in Aspose.CAD 
      CADNET-281 Support to convert DWG to PDF/A & PDF/E format 
      CADNET-261 Support for GP4 image (as an external reference) in Aspose.CAD 
      CADNET-244 Render PDF files as a part of DXF drawings 
      CADNET-189 Export embedded DGN underlay for DXF format 
      CADNET-163 Render DWG document by specifying coordinates 
      CADNET-75 Ability to convert DXF to WMF 
      CADNET-396 Implement reading of encoding for DXF/DWG 
      CADNET-304 Implement export of linked DWF files 
      CADNET-298 Export to PDF/Raster of fixed size 
      CADNET-190 Parse DGN underlay object for DXF 

      Enhancements:
      CADNET-324 StackOverflowException raises during export of DWG image 
      CADNET-445 Investigate ability to add authority metadata to output files 
      CADNET-433 Improper text rendering in DXF to bitmap 
      CADNET-406 Improve reading of DGN v.7 
      CADNET-405 Apply view transformation for DWF if applicable 
      CADNET-404 Implement free point of view option for IFC 
      CADNET-395 Respect measure metrics from IFC file for auto-sizing 
      CADNET-367 Investigate text encoding problem in DWG 
      CADNET-366 Layouts are not converter when saving DWF as an image 
      CADNET-360 Aspose.CAD 17.4.0: Exception when converting DWF to PSD 
      CADNET-358 ImageLoadException on loading DGN file 
      CADNET-356 Fonts are improperly rendered in exported PDF 
      CADNET-333 Error Image export failed 
      CADNET-251 Merge CadRasterizationOptions and DgnRasterizationOptions classes 
      CADNET-153 Improve rendering of hatch patterns 
      CADNET-495 When DXF is exported to BMP, line weight is ignored 
      CADNET-459 Chaning line weight does not affect the weight of line in output image 
      CADNET-460 Improve rendering of lineweights

      Public API changes:
      CADNET-75 Ability to convert DXF to WMF 
	  CADNET-371 Support for setting print area for DWG image in exported PDF 
	  CADNET-163 Render DWG document by specifying coordinates 
	  CADNET-244 Render PDF files as a part of DXF drawings 
	  CADNET-457 Set compliance after converting CAD to PDF 
	  CADNET-281 Support to convert DWG to PDF/A & PDF/E format 
	  CADNET-404 Implement free point of view option for IFC 
	  CADNET-360 Aspose.CAD 17.4.0: Exception when converting DWF to PSD 
	  CADNET-376 3D entities support for DGN v7 
	  CADNET-298 Export to PDF/Raster of fixed size 
	  CADNET-420 Wrong page size when exporting DWG to PDF (.NET) 
	  CADNET-396 Implement reading of encoding for DXF/DWG 

      Please note that Aspose.CAD product was split from Aspose.Imaging product and hence its public API is almost the same so you can easily migrate to Aspose.CAD by renaming your using namespaces to Aspose.CAD instead of Aspose.Imaging.
summary: Aspose.CAD is a library for working with CAD file formats. The library allows to export CAD drawings into Pdfs or any other raster image format. The library has a large scalable and easy to use API, it is a cross platform solution and performs CAD processing using the same set of algorithms for different platforms. Unlike other solutions does not require AutoCAD to be installed and is a fully managed solution.
title: Aspose.CAD for .NET
